name: Independence Contract Drilling, Inc.
description: Independence Contract Drilling, Inc. (ICD) is a leading provider of contract drilling services to onshore oil and natural gas exploration and production companies in the United States. Founded in 2011, ICD specializes in the development and operation of high-quality, efficient drilling rigs, focusing primarily on the Eagle Ford, Permian Basin, and other lucrative shale plays. The company operates a modern fleet of drilling rigs, equipped with advanced technology and safety features, allowing for increased operational efficiency and reduced environmental impact. ICD is committed to delivering superior customer service and operational excellence, which has established it as a trusted partner in the energy sector. As part of its growth strategy, ICD continually invests in its fleet and workforce to enhance its capabilities and meet the evolving demands of its clients. The company also prioritizes safety and sustainability, implementing rigorous safety protocols and environmental practices across its operations. With a strong track record of performance, ICD aims to leverage its expertise and resources to capitalize on opportunities in the dynamic oil and gas market while contributing to the energy needs of the nation.

seo.meta_title: Independence Contract Drilling, Inc. | Leading Contract Drilling Services
seo.meta_description: Independence Contract Drilling, Inc. provides high-quality contract drilling services to oil and gas companies. Discover our commitment to operational excellence and safety.

faq.question: What services does Independence Contract Drilling offer?
faq.answer: Independence Contract Drilling offers contract drilling services primarily for onshore oil and natural gas exploration.

faq.question: When was Independence Contract Drilling founded?
faq.answer: Independence Contract Drilling was founded in 2011.

faq.question: Where is Independence Contract Drilling headquartered?
faq.answer: Independence Contract Drilling is headquartered in Houston, Texas, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Independence Contract Drilling?
faq.answer: The CEO of Independence Contract Drilling is Spencer B. Redd.
